main event: A resident of Castlewood, Virginia reported sighting an elongated, brightly lit object with circular or elliptical formations around it over the town on July 6, 1969 around 10:30 PM.
interesting points: The object was described as hovering or moving slowly over the area.
The witness reported the object was brightly lit.
The weather was clear with a few scattered clouds and good visibility.
The witness contacted local authorities to report the sighting, and it was documented as part of Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official study of unidentified flying objects.
The report includes a sketch or diagram of the sighted object, but no photograph.
sighted object: an elongated, brightly lit object with circular or elliptical formations around it
witnesses: Bert Pickett, a resident of Castlewood, Virginia
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographic evidence
